news_header: In Finland, beauty treatments are increasingly performed with questionable equipment in private settings, leading to around 80 patients treated annually at HUS due to complications from these procedures.
news_original_title: Asiantuntijat huolissaan Kiinasta tilatuista kauneudenhoitolaitteista – halpavekotin ylittää laillisen säteilyrajan jopa satakertaisesti
news_text: An expert from the Radiation Security Centre tested a tattoo removal device from China, which malfunctioned and lacked proper safety features. Many entrepreneurs are purchasing low-quality, high-efficiency devices, posing risks to clients. The rise in complications from aesthetic treatments, especially those done abroad, has been noted, with Turkey and Estonia being common sources. Regulatory reforms are needed to ensure patient safety in aesthetic treatments.
